title: Echoes by the Statue
setting_narration: The Anemo Archon's statue stands majestically, overlooking Mondstadt. A gentle breeze whispers through the trees, carrying the faint scent of cecilias. Amber and Eula stand near its base, the afternoon sun casting long shadows, lending a somber yet peaceful atmosphere to their quiet conversation.

segments.text: The city of Mondstadt hummed softly in the distance, a comforting backdrop to the two Knights of Favonius enjoying a rare moment of stillness.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: It's so peaceful up here, isn't it? Makes you think about... everything.

segments.speaker: Eula
segments.line: Indeed. A rare respite from the ceaseless machinations of this city. Or perhaps, a reminder of what one protects.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Or... sometimes, it makes you think about old memories. Like, old crushes? Or... people you used to really care about, in that way?

segments.speaker: Eula
segments.expression_action: (a subtle flicker of something in her eyes, then composing herself)
segments.line: Such trivial matters are of no concern to the Spindrift Knight. My focus remains on my vengeance.

segments.text: Amber chuckled softly, recognizing the familiar Eula deflection. She knew beneath the 'vengeance' facade, there was a deeply feeling person.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Come on, Eula. Even Knights are allowed to have a past. It's not trivial to remember the people who shaped you, even for a little while.

segments.speaker: Eula
segments.line: Hmph. Perhaps. There were... indeed those who once held a foolish notion of understanding the Lawrence clan's plight. A fleeting alliance of hearts.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Yeah... Sometimes I wonder if they're doing okay, wherever they are now. If they remember me too.

segments.speaker: Eula
segments.expression_action: (turning back to Amber, a rare, almost soft expression)
segments.line: Undoubtedly, Outrider. Your infectious optimism is not easily forgotten. I imagine they remember you with... a similar, if less boisterous, fondness.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Hey, that's almost a compliment from you! Thanks, Eula. It's nice to know someone understands.

segments.text: A comfortable silence fell between them again, broken only by the wind. The ancient statue seemed to bear witness to their shared, unspoken reflections, as the sun began its slow descent.
